com.cmput301.cs.project.activities

Class CommentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.cmput301.cs.project.activities.CommentActivity

  • public class CommentActivity
extends Activity
    Comment activity returns a result with a comment in the intent as CommentActivity.COMMENT_TEXT Used as an approver to add comments when returning and approving
    Author:
    Blaine
